N10: Set Return to Home (RTH) altitude to 100 m (328 ft).;
N13: Set maximum flight altitude to 500 m (1640 ft).;
E9: Flight mode changed to Starting Motors.
E7: Flight mode changed to Manual Takeoff.
N5: Adjust antennas and make sure they are perpendicular to flight direction of aircraft.
E12: Flight mode changed to Auto Landing.
N11: Make sure the area under the aircraft is safe for landing.
N14: Push throttle down to use force landing.
